MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 24-NOV-2020 14:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety in the LL33 postcode area of Llanfairfechan following reports of damaged equipment on the overhead line network. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:32 pm on 24th November, 2020.
